questions.text: What is a primary application of cybersecurity in modern IT?
options: Cybersecurity implements defense mechanisms against malware, phishing, and other threats
Security measures should be implemented only after a breach occurs
Cybersecurity is only necessary for large enterprises
Strong passwords alone are sufficient for complete security protection
questions.correctAnswer: Cybersecurity implements defense mechanisms against malware, phishing, and other threats
questions.explanation: A comprehensive security strategy includes prevention, detection, and response mechanisms.

questions.text: Which statement accurately describes cybersecurity?
options: All security threats can be prevented with a single firewall
cybersecurity is not applicable in cloud environments
Encryption transforms data into an unreadable format to protect it from unauthorized access
Security measures should be implemented only after a breach occurs
questions.correctAnswer: Encryption transforms data into an unreadable format to protect it from unauthorized access
questions.explanation: Cybersecurity encompasses technologies, processes, and practices designed to protect systems, networks, and data from cyber attacks.

questions.text: What is a primary application of cloud in modern IT?
options: CLOUD only works with specific languages
Data stored in the cloud is automatically more secure than on-premises storage
Cloud services work identically across all providers
Cloud infrastructure supports global distribution and high availability of applications
questions.correctAnswer: CLOUD only works with specific languages
questions.explanation: Cloud computing allows organizations to access computing resources on-demand, paying only for what they use.

questions.text: Which statement accurately describes cloud?
options: Migrating to the cloud eliminates the need for IT expertise
CLOUD is deprecated and no longer recommended
Software as a Service (SaaS) delivers applications over the internet on a subscription basis
Cloud services work identically across all providers
questions.correctAnswer: Software as a Service (SaaS) delivers applications over the internet on a subscription basis
questions.explanation: Multi-cloud and hybrid cloud strategies provide flexibility and avoid vendor lock-in.

questions.text: What is a primary application of programming in modern IT?
options: DevOps bridges the gap between development and operations teams, enabling faster delivery cycles

questions.correctAnswer: DevOps bridges the gap between development and operations teams, enabling faster delivery cycles
questions.explanation: DevOps combines cultural philosophies, practices, and tools that increase an organization's ability to deliver applications and services at high velocity.

questions.text: Which statement accurately describes programming?

questions.explanation: By automating the software delivery pipeline, organizations can respond more quickly to market changes and customer needs.

questions.text: What is a primary application of ai in modern IT?

Neural networks work identically to traditional algorithms
Machine learning models cannot handle real-time data processing
AI automates repetitive tasks and decision-making processes, improving efficiency in IT operations
questions.correctAnswer: ai requires specialized hardware
questions.explanation: Machine learning, a subset of AI, allows systems to improve their performance through experience without explicit programming.
